Reviews.Content: product is awesomethough I do not like windows this is a machinenow this is after 3 days use so hopefully it continues

Reviews.Title: Good but could use improvement
Reviews.Author: Kyle Snider
Reviews.Content: Of course like any new computer, you must update the existing software and stuff. Then there is all the bloatware on it that must be removed. Once past this, the wireless card on this device is not particularly strong.  I have been having issues with it. Also one of the keys on the keyboard does not work properly. Overall it works pretty well for the needs I have for it.

ProductInfo.Features:
• Windows 8 lets you easily switch between apps, zoom to the stuff you want, rearrange tiles, and so much more
Intel Core i5 Ivy Bridge processor delivers faster system performance, uses less power, and enables sharpergraphics
• 11.6-inch double-sided Full HD display with in-plane switching (IPS) technology provides a clear view from anyangle
• 128 GB solid state drive enables speedy overall system performance with faster bootups and shut down times
• 5-megapixel camera on the tablet and HD webcam on the notebook are great for snapping photos and video chats
ProductInfo.Name: ASUS Taichi 21-UH51 11.6-Inch Convertible 2 in 1 Touchscreen Ultrabook
